items.subject: Bitcoin Park Austin: Austin Bitdevs Reminder
items.body:
Friends - quick reminder that Austin Bitdevs is this Thursday, April 17th at Bitcoin Park Austin (formerly the Bitcoin Commons). Same location, same vibe, new and renewed energy! 7-9pm, doors open 6:30pm. Sign up with link below:


https://www.meetup.com/bitcoin-park-austin/events/304930332/


Also, if you didn't know, we've also begun hosting a range of events at Park Austin during the same week as Bitdevs. Links below to other events:


Austin Bitcoin Design Club: tonight 6:30pm Tues April 15th

The Satoshi Papers (Meet the Authors): tomorrow Wed Apr 16th 3:30pm

Austin AI Meetup (hosted by Justin Moon & Anthony Ronning): tomorrow Wed Apr 16th 7pm


Look forward to seeing folks out there!


Best, Parker

items.subject: Explore Our Messaging API
items.body:
Hello Lucas,

Thank you for creating an account on Unipile. You have now access to our messaging API, allowing you to integrate messaging channels like LinkedIn, Email or WhatsApp into your software to enhance your usersâ experience.

So, what can you do now?

- Dashboard: Consult your account, generate your token, choose your subscription planâ¦
- Documentation: Getting started, connection methods, API referenceâ¦
- How to integrate in just few days: Take a look at how our clients integrate our API.

For any questions, you can contact me or you can join our Slack Community and engage with us through direct messaging.

If you prefer a more interactive approach, I am also available for a video call to discuss and address any questions you may have. Feel free to book a meeting in my calendar: https://calendar.app.google/qEnkwtNBpHq2yZx99

Thank you once again,

Best regards,


Julien CrÃ©pieux
Co-founder & CEO
Enhancing Message Sync for Your App with Unipile

Take our charts for a walk

 

Hey,

So you've got to grips with our charting basics â now itâs time to let this puppy out for a real play. Here are four of our most important tools to try out next.

 

Multiple charts

 

Use the multi chart function on our upgraded plans to view up to 16 charts per tab - much easier for comparing symbols and switching between views.

 
 

Bar Replay

 

Activate the Bar Replay tool to skip back in time and replay the market, so you can test your ideas and analyze your strategies before you use them in the wild.

 
 

Spread charts

 

Take a look at spread charts to get a unique perspective on the markets, and compare a symbol with another variable â such as a numerical value or different symbol.

 
 

Time Intervals

 

Upgrade to a paid plan to get a fuller range of time intervals, from 1 second to 1 month - plus with a Premium plan you can even set your own custom time intervals to fine-tune your setup.

 
 

Thatâs it for now. Ready to explore some more?

 
Let's go
 

Time to take your next big leap? Donât forget you can test drive our Pro, Pro+, or Premium accounts for 30 days, completely free.

 

See you soon
Team TradingView

 
Thanks for reading,
The TradingView Team
470 Olde Worthington Rd., Suite 200
Westerville OH 43082
App Store Google Play Desktop app
Facebook YouTube LinkedIn X

items.subject: Your HSA Statement is Ready for Viewing - Download Now!
items.body:
Administrator Name: WealthCare
Administrator Address: PO Box 162177
Altamonte Springs, FL 32716
Employer Name: WealthCare HSA2
Participant Name: Lucas Bazemore

Your latest Health Savings Account (HSA) Statement is now available for you to view, download and print. If you are not opted in to electronic communications, your statement will also be mailed to you.

Access your HSA Statement Online

You may access your HSA Statement by logging into your account on your Portal

Error Resolution Procedures for Debit Card Transactions and All Other Transactions

If you believe that an error has occurred on your account or appears on your statement or receipt, or you need more information about a transaction or an official dispute form, please contact WealthCare* Saver immediately toll-free at 1-866-287-5675.

Debit Card Transactions
Should you need to file an official dispute for a debit card transaction, please refer to your Debit Card Agreement for instructions.

All Other Transactions
Should you need to file an official dispute for non-debit card transactions with the Custodian, you must complete and submit the appropriate dispute form within 60 days from the date on which the transaction was credited or debited to your account. Please refer to your Health Savings Account Program Custodial Agreement and Privacy Policy for instructions.

Sincerely,
Your WealthCare Concierge Team


*Alegeus Technologies, LLC, d/b/a WealthCare Saver, is licensed with the IRS as a Non-Bank Custodian.

**THIS IS AN AUTOMATED EMAIL - PLEASE DO NOT REPLY**
